name: Frozen Mirror
description:
Be a snowman. Explore a magical cave and solve all the puzzles....
Keep in mind. Whatever can be seen in the mirror, it exists.

Controls : WASD or Arrow Keys to move, E to pick up torches

This game was created for the Ludum Dare 30 : Theme "Connected Worlds"

Team : 

Johannes Alef

Rebecca Schieren

Hong Linh Thai
